Fe2(BDP)3.time: Reaction refluxed under nitrogen for 18 hours, material heated in DMSO at 100°C for 8 hours, washed multiple times with heated DMSO, DMF, and methylene chloride, heated under 10 mTorr vacuum to 180°C for 24 hours
Fe2(BDP)3.washing_method: Washed 5 times with heated DMSO, 6 times with DMF heated to 100°C, 6 times with methylene chloride heated to 70°C
Fe2(BDP)3.drying_method: Heated under 10 mTorr vacuum to 180°C for 24 hours

additional_steps.details: Activated by heating at a rate of 1 °C/min from room temperature to a final temperature of 180 °C until the outgas rate at 150 °C was less than 2 µbar/min, which occurred near 48 hours after the start of evacuation

A column of 0.491 g of Fe2(BDP)3 was packed into a glass u-tube, with an internal diameter of 0.9525 cm and a height of 11.5 cm. Dry N2 at a rate of 2.5 mL/min was bubbled through a mixture of hexane isomers
